name: secondhand
content:
secondhand adjective, adverb [not gradable]
(OWNED BEFORE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
owned or used in the past by someone else: a secondhand car I bought it second-hand at that bookstore on Elm Street.
secondhand adjective, adverb [not gradable]
(LEARNED INDIRECTLY)
learned or heard about from someone else rather than directly from the person involved: She said she had heard second-hand reports of officers sleeping on the job.
